boardgame.name: Karuba
カルバ
卡魯巴
boardgame.description: This is a tile-laying race game with players starting with boards that are identical, and one player drawing tiles that they all will use. They race to get their explorers to temples first and earn points. Along the way they can collect additional points by collecting items off the paths they create. The game ends when one player gets all of their explorers to their corresponding temples or whenever the last tile is drawn and placed. Most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Description from the English Ruleset:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Many moons have come and gone since your boats departed on the journey to Karuba. Once you arrive on the island, each player will lead an expedition team of four adventurers. Now you just have to navigate your way through the dense jungle to make it to the temples. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bdquo;Just_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo; may be something of an understatement; the ancient jungle trails have to be found and uncovered first! Hurry up and be the first to reach the temples to collect the most valuable treasures. Many paths have dead ends and you need to be patient to find the right/best way (through the jungle). Look! A gold nugget! You can pick it up and collect it, same applies to the shiny crystals along the paths._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Prefer PayPal or Venmo Buyers pay actual shipping costs. I can give an estimate if you list your zip with your bid and send me a geekmail. All games will be shipped via USPS. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m open to potentially using other options if preferred. I will only charge for shipping charges and will refund any difference if I initially use an estimate. International buyers are welcome, but be aware that international shipping these days is not cheap! I will only use USPS to ship international. If you are relatively close by and wish to pick up the game from me in person in Los Angeles, CA, that can also be arranged. I also do a lot of driving for work, mainly on the Westside and would be more than happy to drop the game off if you live in that neck of the woods...or meet you halfway if you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t.
